Articles.Content:
Ok, I am going to write a story, with some basic information. At the end, I will give 3-5 choices on what will happen next. Most of those will be what the main character should do, but some will be about the environment. The first person to post a choice chooses, and you can\'t add to the plot outside of choices unless: 1) I let you with an 'other' choice 2) It may not be a choice, but I may integrate into the choice at hand.

WARNING! THIS TOPIC MAY CONTAINS VIOLENCE! I KNOW IT\'S OBVIOUS AROUND THE INTERNET, BUT I FEEL INCLINED TO ADD A WARNING HERE!

Ok, this is the start of the story:

Inventory: n/a

Time: ??

Place: ??

Health: ??

You wake up with a dull ring in your ears. You look around your location. Where are you, and in what condition?

a) Neighborhood street, with some scratches

Dark room, tied up, blood around your chair

c) Back of a car, fractured limb

d) Some sort of military base

Inventory: n/a

Time: Afternoon

Place: In a car

Health: Fractured arm

You hear dying flames, and feel a sharp pain in your left arm. You notice that you are in the back of a car. You try to open the door, but find that it\'s stuck. You start to try the other door, when you hear a noise outside. A person shambles up to the door, and tries to break in. Is he a zombie, and do you get help?

a) Zombie, you\'re on your own

Zombie, someone comes and helps

c) Human, on your own

d) Human, help
a ;P

Inventory: n/a

Time: Afternoon

Place: On some street

Health: Fractured arm

You scramble to find something in the car, anything. You discover a nailgun, a small wooden plank, a piece of PVC, and a hypodermic needle filled with something (it\'s not illegal drugs, but you do not know what is in it). You grab it all, but you need to do something to kill that zombie.

a) Use the nailgun

Beat it with the plank

c) Use pipe as blowpipe, needle as ammo

d) Another idea with these items? Your choice (only use these items for your idea)

e) Just run out the other door!

Remember, if you break these items you may not get them back, and they may help you later on, or they may not. Think like Macgyver, or Jeb, or Bear Grylls. Also, think of pre-existing issues that could be fixed with the items *ahem*.
d) Inject yourself with the mysterious needle. Attach the wooden plank and pvc pipe together using the nailgun to build a new weapon.

d) Inject yourself with the mysterious needle. Attach the wooden plank and pvc pipe together using the nailgun to build a new weapon.

Ok, I need more information on what this weapon would be. Also, You can\'t do both things at once. And as a reminder, you may want to leave something after taking out the zombie. Everything I gave the main character has a purpose, it just depends on whether you take the right path.
okay then, how \'bout a)
this story needs more humorous solutions. Kill the zombie by beating it with a twinkie!
Kill zombies with kindness. 8)

Inventory: nailgun, plank, pvc, needle

Time: Afternoon

Place: On some street

Health: Fractured arm

You grab the nailgun and pull the trigger at the zombie, but alas, it doesn\'t fire! There\'s no nails in it! You grab all of your items, and just break out of the car. After running for a few minutes, you discover that the zombie is no longer following you. Unfortunately, another one jumped on top of you, and now it\'s gonna eat your brains! Unless...

a) Stick it with the needle

Yell for help

c) Smash its head off with the plank

d) You reach behind you and grab... (your choice)

d) reach behind and grab a

dildo

oh wait...

d) reach behind and grab a

dildo

oh wait...

no

Inventory: nailgun, plank, pvc

Time: Afternoon

Place: On some street

Health: Fractured arm

You grab the needle and stick it into the zombie. it jumps off you, and goes into an epileptic fit. After about a minute, it s skin starts to turn green, and it becomes smaller in size. it then walks off to a junkyard, mumbling something about getting some boosters for the 'Mun'. Now, before you continue, you should figure out how to fix this fractured arm so it does not bother you.

a) Tough men let their broken bones stay loose!

Use the plank as a splint

c) Use the PVC as a splint

d) Use epic wizard skillz on teh wound

a

(or optional e: It\'s not a clean break and you need to break it some more)

Inventory: nailgun, plank, pvc

Time: Evening

Place: On some street

Health: Fractured arm

You decide to let nature do its thing on your wound, and you keep walking. Night is coming, and since you are a fan of zombie horror you know you need somewhere to spend the night. You see a house up ahead, it seems to have every entrance broken open. Right next to it is a that has barricades over every entrance. You look behind you and see a light in the distance, but it seems too far away to reach before nightfall. Just before you make up your mind, you hear a scream, and run to the location where you heard it. You see a woman about to be mauled by a zombie. You also hear more zombies shambling up the street. Time is running out for your decision!

a) Use your tools to kill the zombie

Screw her, find safety for yourself (pick one of the locations to head towards)

c) Make your final stand, here and now!

a.

wait, is there only a single zombie present, or shitloads of them?

wait, is there only a single zombie present, or shitloads of them?

There\'s one right now, but if you don\'t hurry more will come.

Inventory: nailgun, plank, pvc

Time: Evening

Place: On some street

Health: Fractured arm

You grab your PVC pipe and smash the zombie\'s skull in. The women thanks you, and tells you she lives in one of the houses. She offers you a place to stay for the night. Groans can be heard, as the horde is coming fast. What do you do?

a) Take up her offer, a safe place is good

Kill and loot her, then break into her house

c) Final stand versus the zombies

d) Negotiate with the zombies, maybe they can communicate?

Inventory: nailgun, plank, bloody pvc

Time: Evening

Place: On some street

Health: Fractured arm

You walk up to the zombies, and start a tear-wrenching speech on equality between humans and zombies. As you are, the zombies are sizing up your body for their meal, and moans of joy are heard at food. Unfortunately, you consider this to be applause, and continue. After you conclude, the zombies moan yet again and take you with them. You get so wrapped up in the fact that you may have just saved a new species of man, you don\'t realize that they are about to rip out your flesh.

a) You realize what is going on, and try to escape

The woman comes back!

c) Jeb?!?!?!?!

Inventory: nailgun, plank, bloody pvc

Time: Twilight

Place: On some street

Health: Fractured arm

Yous suddenly hear a noise, and watch as an object goes into the sky in a plume of smoke. Its stops, then flips over and at that point you realize it\'s heading for you! The rocket just barely misses you, but kills nearly all the zombies. That green creature jumps out of the cockpit and walks off again, mumbling about needing more boosters. You now have little time before a large horde of zombies enter for night feasting. there\'s still the two houses, and there\'s a bunch of beams here, maybe you could make your own shelter in a car?

a) The broken-into house

The barricaded house

c) Tough men don\'t need shelter!

d) Build a shelter!

Inventory: nailgun, plank, bloody pvc

Time: Night

Place: On some street

Health: Broken left arm

After a while, you manage to construct a fort our of the car and beams. Unfortunately, you have further stressed you fracture, and it is now officially broken. There is no way you will be able to use your arm in this state. Then, you see the horde. About a thousand zombies march shamble past your hiding place, and into every nook and cranny they could find, hoping for some flesh. They seem to not bother with humans that have locked themselves in, so your safe for now. Since your stuck, you should probably do something about this broken arm!

a) Cut it off, useless limb!

Use the plank/bloody pvc as a splint

c) Jump out and surprise the horde
